ValidationRule.description: Ensures Funded status cannot revert to earlier status
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), PRIORVALUE(Status__c) = "Funded", NOT(OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Funded"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Cancelled") )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Once funded, application can only be cancelled or remain funded
